body.p: Python 2.4 gets stabilized this week, writes the new Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The Gentoo/ALT team has met and agreed on restructuring and above all reanimation of the project, and the Italian documentation translators are looking for additional colleagues. Two events in Japan are coming up, their descriptions to be found in the international section. There are press clippings, Bugzilla statistics and a number of fresh security announcements to round off this week's edition, enjoy reading.
